title: Hint
text: Use the kinematic equation relating initial and final velocities, acceleration, and displacement to calculate the deceleration. Then, apply Newton's second law to find the force exerted.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Use the kinematic equation to calculate the deceleration of the dolphin. Step 2: Apply Newton's second law to find the average force exerted. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units. Step 4: Check your answer for correctness and proper units.
